amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill any settlement pertaining to discrimination based on race, religion, national origin, or any other protected category.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-724 to exempt from the bill any settlement pertaining to discrimination based on race, religion, national origin, or any other protected category.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 234 (Roll no. 483).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 234 (Roll no. 483).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Conyers.
